description.p: Sets the open or closed state of a modern frame.

argument.name: frameId
argument.description: The ID of the frame control.

argument.name: state
argument.description: The frame state. Can be 'open', 'closed', or 'toggle'.

discussion.p: The *[js:{dialog.object}.frameOpenStateChange()]* method sets the open state for a modern frame control. It can be used to open, close, or toggle the current state of the frame.

A modern frame is a frame with its [Frame type property] set to 'Modern'. A modern frame can be configure to display an [show/hide button] which is used to show or hide the contents of the frame, as shown below.
